========================
 coopr.openopt CHANGELOG
========================

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1.1
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Updated openopt driver to return (rc,log) from _apply_solver()

- Tracking change in _coef name.

- Indicate the availability of OpenOpt solvers through the available() method.

- py3k portability changes.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1.0.3
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Update to track changes in coopr.pyomo.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1.0.2
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Bug fix in naming due to changes in VarData objects.

- Use FuncDesigner functions if they are defined.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1.0.1
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Name change: _VarValue to _VarData

- Checking for Constraint instead of ConstraintBase.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 1.0
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

- Initial release.
